## ZqliteWatermarkService.getResumeToken() method

Retrieves the change stream resume token for a given shard and watermark.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getResumeToken(shardId: string, watermark: LexiVersion): Promise<string | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

shardId


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The identifier of the shard.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

watermark


</td><td>

LexiVersion


</td><td>

The watermark version.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string \| undefined&gt;

A promise that resolves to the resume token as a string, or `undefined` if one is not found.
